name: Marita Bergman
description: I am a woman and I know the role of a good woman in a relationship.I will do my best to make my home peaceful.I am serious and ready to settle down.l am an honest, non-racist, trustworthy loving hot and charming lady and l love to cherish my opposite human and l am willing to relocate. ready to do my best to please my lover, and same thing l want from a man willing to share his love with me for ever.
